name: Receives an incoming message
fullName: Pipedrive API v1/Channels#Receives an incoming message
description: Adds a message to a conversation. To use the endpoint, you need to have **Messengers integration** OAuth scope enabled and the Messaging manifest ready for the [Messaging app extension](https://pipedrive.readme.io/docs/messaging-app-extension).
descriptionHtml: Adds a message to a conversation. To use the endpoint, you need to have Messengers integration OAuth scope enabled and the Messaging manifest ready for the [Messaging app extension](https://pipedrive.readme.io/docs/messaging-app-extension).
